channel.title: Examples on AsCode - Terraform Alternative Syntax
channel.description: Recent content in Examples on AsCode - Terraform Alternative Syntax

item.title: Using functions
item.description: This example illustrates how with the usage through the usage of functions, we can simplify and improve the readability of our infrastructure declaration.

item.title: Runtime Modules
item.description: AsCode comes with a variety of modules available like http, math, encoding/json, etc. All this modules are available runtime through the load statement. This example shows the usage of this modules and some others.
